name: The Biscoiteiro
description:
This game is called 'The Biscoiteiro'. You are an famous character of social media that is a really show-off, or most known as "Biscoiteiro". Your goal is to create the biggest horde of followers that are despered to give you some cookies.

CLICK TO JUMP!

 But be careful! There are two things that you have to avoid!

 - Destroy the report houses that report you!  If you miss 10 report houses, your account will be suspended! Which means, you lose the game! Destroy 5 houses so your report level decreases!

 - Don't let your followers falls off the data that you in! If they fall into the hole, you lose followers in your account!

After getting enough number of follows in your account, you will get to be NAKED! Yes! The number of new followers will increase and you will be unstoppable!

Credits:

- Background sound: Synth & Piano Loop 1_3 Drums Combo (90bpm) by Erokia

- Power sound: Electro base x1 by frankum
